resources.string: Once you have objects on your prototype, perform a single tap on one of them to activate the overlay shown left. You are now in editmode and able to adjust various parameters of the selected object. To deselect the object, simply tap somewhere else on the screen.
While you are in editmode, you can drag objects around by dragging the center part of the overlay.
While in editmode you can change the size of an object by dragging one of the handles surrounding the selected object.

To delete unwanted objects simply drag the object out of the screen to the delezezone on the left. Dropping it over the delezezone will delete the object, dragging it back to the screen will reposition it. To cancel the operation drop the object on the black area around the virtual screen.
